nodes.text: Stephanie Silva is an English actress who worked as a creature and droid performer in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens, and also portrayed ME-8D9 in the film. In Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, Silva portrayed Silvanie Phest. The following year, she appeared in Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi as a casino alien. In 2018, she portrayed Silvasu Fi in Solo: A Star Wars Story and in 2019 she appeared as Sylphanie Stil in Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker.
